content: the judah hat is a quick and simple ribbed hat pattern that pairs perfectly with the judah scarf it features a 1x1 rib brim that transitions into a broken 1x1 rib for a soft textured look knit in worsted weight yarn on size 7 4 5mm needles it s a great beginner project using only knit purl and ssk stitches works up fast and makes the perfect gift or winter accessory free pattern available on my blog 1 1 https //amandammorse com/the-judah-hat-a-free-ribbed-hat-pattern/
